allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix callouts not resuming after workout is paused

When resuming a paused workout, the speech synthesis was not being
resumed, causing callouts to remain silent. The pauseSession function
now checks the current pause state and calls speechSynthesis.resume\(\)
when unpausing, instead of always calling pause\(\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(else echo "SDK not found in standard locations")
